title: Soutien Temple Orbital - Sangisa Mission
heading: Soutien Temple Orbital
vision: Na mokolo ya 28 Novɛmbɛ 2025 , Orbital Temple ekobanda kobima na Inde na fusée ya ISRO . Satellite ya art participatif ya Sud mondial, ezali monument ya inclusion radicale, plateforme ya éducation, mpe catalyseur ya masolo ya mokili mobimba sur l’avenir ya sacré na âge ya technologie, AI mpe exploration spatiale.
videoCaption: Maloba ya ebandeli ya video ya Tempelo ya Orbital, 1 min.

accomplished.heading: Oyo Tosili Kokokisa
accomplished.content: Nsima ya mibu minei ya bolukiluki mpe bokeli, misio ebongami. Tosilisi développement ya matériel mpe logiciel mpo na satellite, toleki ba tests officiels ya shaker oyo esengeli mpo na certification ya vol, mpe tosilisaki contrat na biso na ISRO. Satellite yango etongami. Teknolozi yango esalaka. Tozali ko dégager mpo na lancement.

decade.heading: Mbula zomi oyo ezali liboso
decade.intro: Mission oyo ekosila te le 28 novembre 2025. Ebandi kaka.
decade.paragraph1: Na boumeli ya mbula 10 oyo ekolanda , satellite yango ekobaluka zingazinga ya Mabelé, ekoyanola na bankombo oyo etindami na nsɔngɛ nyonso ya planɛti. Programme ya mateya ezali na mokano ya kopesa mateya na bankoto ya bilenge na technologie ya satellite, kobuka Space Gap mpo na Sud mondial. Documentaire yango ekokoma epai ya bamilio ya bato na mokili mobimba, mpe ekobimisa masolo na ntina ya kozala ya moto ye moko, bokundoli, mpe ya bule.
decade.paragraph2: Orbital Temple ezali kosala boyokani na Sathi Roy mpe The Roy Foundation mpo na kosala ete emonaneli oyo ya mibu zomi ezala na ntina na mimeseno. Fondation Roy ezali lingomba oyo ezali koluka litomba te oyo emipesi mpo na kopanzana ya bozwi ya mateya ya molimo, kobikisa mayoki, mpe bisaleli ya bososoli mpo na masanga oyo mazali na lisalisi mingi te na mokili mobimba, kosala pont ya mayele ya kala mpe tekiniki ya mikolo oyo mpo na kokela mokili ya bososoli mingi, ya boyokani, mpe ya mawa. Elongo, tozali kotonga ba infrastructures mpo na kosala ete Orbital Temple ekoma mouvement ya koumela oyo ekomi na ba communautés na mokili mobimba.
decade.paragraph3: Lisungi na bino epesaka kaka mosolo te mpo na kosala lancement; ezali kosala mouvement oyo eko écho pendant une décennie mpe eko inspirer génération oyo ekoya ya ba artistes mpe ba ingénieurs spatiaux.

launch.description: Kobwaka mpenza mbongo na fusée ISRO na mokolo ya 28 Novɛmbɛ 2025 . Yango etindi Orbital Temple na orbite, esika ekotikala na boumeli ya mibu zomi lokola satellite ya art participatif mpe tempelo na lola, accessible na moto nyonso na mokili.

Mobembo oyo ezali na ntina mingi mpo na filmage documentaire, couverture ya ba médias, mpe ko représenter Sud mondial na moment historique oyo.

education.description: Kobongisa mpe kobanda cours mobimba ya minoko mingi oyo ezali koteya bilenge ya Global South ndenge ya kotonga ba satellites. Esangisi bokeli manaka ya kelasi, bokeli ya video, boyambi ya plateforme, mpe mbula ya yambo ya bourse mpo na banakelasi oyo bazali na lisalisi ya malamu te. Ezali kosala ba infrastructures ya koumela mpo na éducation spatiale.

Esangisi kosala 2 interviews ya mozindo na Inde na ba leaders ya makanisi mpe ba praticiens spirituels, ba petites équipages voyage mpe production, mpe édition ya ba vidéos avant production. Phase oyo e établir fondation ya documentaire mpe e valider direction créative.

docProd.title: Misolo ya Production Documentaire
docProd.description: Production complète mpe post-production ya "Nini esalaka Temple?" , filme ya monene oyo ezali kotala ndenge mayemi, tekiniki, mpe makambo ya bulɛɛ ekutani. Esangisi ba films na ba pays ebele, ba interviews ya kobakisa na ba leaders ya makanisi, édition complète, classement ya couleur, design ya son, pe ba projections ya première na Inde na NYC .

artCollector.title: Kokoma Seul Collecteur ya Art ya Temple Orbital
artCollector.imageAlt: Installation ya Temple orbital na Biennale ya Mercosul
artCollector.imageCaption: Temple orbital na 13e Biennal ya Mercosul, Porto Alegre. Fɔtɔ́ ya Clara Marques.
artCollector.paragraph1: Ba satellites misato oyo ekokani etongamaki mpo na mission oyo. Moko ekokende na espace le 28 novembre 2025. Moko akokende na ba expositions ya ba musées na mokili mobimba. Moko ezali réservée mpo na collecteur genereux oyo alingi ko financer vision oyo mpe kozala na pièce ya histoire ya art spatial.
artCollector.paragraph2: Oyo ezali kopi te; ezali moko ya ba satellites misato ya ebandeli. Nave spatiale oyo esalaka mobimba oyo ezali mpe ekeko . Satellite yango ezali na bonene ya 5cm3 mpe ezali na kilo 245g , na dôme oyo esalemi na wolo .
artCollector.paragraph4: Lokola mosangisi, okozwa installation moko oyo esalemaki mpo na 13e Biennale ya Mercosul , écran muséologique complet oyo ezali kolakisa satellite lokola art mpe technologie. Installation oyo elakisami na ba grandes endroits internationales mpe ezali ko représenter niveau ya likolo ya présentation ya art spatial.
artCollector.paragraph5: Lisungi na bino esalisaka mpo na kopesa mosolo na vision mobimba : lancement, programme ya éducation, mpe documentaire oyo eko déclencher masolo ya mokili mobimba na oyo etali bule na âge ya technologie, AI mpe exploration spatiale. Kombo na yo ekomi libela ekangami na mission historique oyo.
artCollector.button: Tuna Na ntina Na Libaku Oyo

gratitude.heading: Na Matondo na Basungi na Biso
gratitude.intro: Temple Orbital esalemi possible na ba institutions, batu, pe bandimi ya inclusion radicale oyo ba comprendre que art e créer ba imaginaires ya lobi.

pearmill.title: Mosungi ya Mobandisi
pearmill.description: Pearmill ezali moko ya ba agences ya marketing ya performance oyo ezali kokola noki na Etats-Unis, groupe ya ba designers, ba marcheurs, mpe ba ingénieurs oyo bazali kosala elongo mpo na kosunga kokola mwa ba startups oyo ezali iconique na mokili. Lisungi na bango ya motema malamu epesaki nzela na ekipi ya Tempelo ya Orbital mpo na kosomba biloko ya ntina mpe kosala matériel ya source ouverte oyo esalaka ete mission oyo ya satellite ezala possible.

gratitude.yourName: Nkombo na yo ekoki kozala awa. Sangisa biso na kokela histoire.

people.heading: Bato Bazali Sima Ya Mission Oyo
people.intro: Orbital Temple ezali elaka ya mibu 10. Ekambami na bato mibale oyo balekisaki bomoi na bango na kosala pont ya art, technologie, mpe boyokani ya bato, mpe oyo bazali kotonga ba infrastructures mpo na kobatela vision oyo mpo na mibu zomi oyo ezali koya.

edson.name: Edson Pavoni azali moto ya mayele
edson.paragraph1: Edson azali artiste mpe technologue oyo azali ko explorer intimité ya batu na intersection ya art na technologie. Pratique na ye etali ba installations architecturales, poésie, photographie, mpe technologie ya satellite.
edson.paragraph2: Misala na ye elakisami na 13e Biennale ya Mercosul (Brésil), IX Biennale international (Ouzbékistan), mpe NTU Global Digital Art Prize (Singapore).
edson.paragraph3: Na mibu koleka 20 na domaine ya art mpe technologie , asali na ba équipes créatives mpo na ba jeux olympiques ya Rio ya 2016 mpe Banque interaméricaine de développement . Proxxima Magazine ezwaki nkombo moko ya bato 50 ya mayele ya Brésil oyo bazalaki na mayele ya sika na Proxxima Magazine, azwaki mbano mibale ya kolandana ya IF Design Awards (2017-2018) mpe azalaki finaliste ya Prix Lumen Prize Futures Award . Misala na ye elakisami na ba biennales mibale mpe elakisami na Ludwig Museum of Contemporary Art (Budapest), Inhotim Institute (Brésil), mpe Design and Fashion Museum (Lisbonne), na ba expositions na New York, Pékin, Singapour, Dubaï, Rio de Janeiro, mpe na bingumba mosusu.

sathi.name: Sathi Roy, oyo azali
sathi.role: Mobandisi, Fondation Roy & Mosangani ya mayele
sathi.paragraph1: Sathi azali mobandisi ya The Roy Foundation , lingomba oyo ezali koluka litomba te oyo emipesi mpo na kopanzana ya kozwa mateya ya molimo, kobikisa mayoki, mpe bisaleli ya bososoli mpo na masanga ya bato oyo bazali na lisalisi mingi te na mokili mobimba. Fondation esalaka boyokani na biteyelo, bibongiseli ya mimeseno, mpe mangomba ya mboka mpo na kokabola bisaleli ya bolamu oyo esalemi na AI, manaka ya mateya ya lisanga, mpe bapanzi sango oyo efulaka mbongwana.
sathi.paragraph2: Na mayele ya neuroscience, coaching, mpe leadership, Sathi atongaki mpe akambaki ba équipes na Amérique du Nord mpe Inde mobimba, kobimisaka 600 millions ya ba dollars na botekisi ya mbula na mbula na entreprise moko. Azali mpe mobandisi ya OHM , mouvement spirituel ya liboso ya numérique, Co-Fondateur ya SUTE (plateforme ya bureau oyo etambwisami na AI numérique), mpe azali kosala lokola Conseiller mpe Chef mondial ya croissance mpo na RISE Global Creative .
sathi.paragraph3: Lokola mwasi ya Bengali-Américain oyo azali kosala pont na ba philosophies ya Est mpe ya Ouest, Sathi amemi perspective unique na ba mouvements spirituels mpe artistiques na ekeke ya 21. With a growing network of 65,000+ followers and over 40 million online impressions , azali kotonga masanga ya mokili mobimba oyo ekangami na kati ya bokabwani ya mimeseno mpe ya molimo.

people.together: Elongo na The Roy Foundation, tozali kotonga mission ya mibu 10 oyo ezali kosala pont ya art, technologie, éducation, mpe ya bule, kobanda na botiami ya satellite na mokolo ya 28 novembre 2025, mpe kokoba na mouvement oyo ekokoma na ba communautés oyo ezali na ba services mingi te na mokili mobimba mpe ekofula nkola ekoya.

join.heading: Sangisa Biso
join.content: Satellite yango etongami. Teknolozi yango esili kobongisama. Date ya lancement etiamaki: 28 novembre 2025 . Oyo ezali ntango ya kosangana na mission oyo ezali kokanisa lisusu nini art ekoki kosala, esika nini ekoki kokende, mpe nani ekoki kosalela.
